ygData.subject: Maestro (was: Re: [eqbards] 50+ bard songs)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I haven t noticed any major changes with him lately.  He is significantly harder when dual wielding Evensong and 6note.  The key to beating him is to make
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 24 Apr 2000, Sylly Songsynger wrote:

> WTG on the Maestro!! I have been hearing rumors that he was buffed up?
> True or same old music maestro?

I haven't noticed any major changes with him lately. He is significantly
harder when dual wielding Evensong and 6note. The key to beating him is
to make sure everyone is poison and magic resist buffed beforehand,
keeping casters/clerics out of melee range at all possible times, and
preventing him from flying around uncontrolled. The last is accomplished
by making sure the nukers hold fire until he's at 66% of his health.

Athren Notechaser, 50th composition in progress
Cazic-Thule <The Relentless>
